classes.description: A block of wax with a wick that is lit to produce light.

properties.name: candleName
properties.description: The name or type of the candle.

properties.name: scent
properties.description: The aroma or scent of the candle.

properties.name: burnTime
properties.description: Estimated time the candle will burn in hours.

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The company or individual who produced the candle.

classes.description: A company or individual producing candles.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location or headquarters of the manufacturer.

properties.name: contact
properties.description: Contact details for inquiries or support.
